pickers.description:

Target: One building
Mana Cost: 275
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Target: One player

Target: All opponents

pickers.name: Mana Steal/Transfer [A]
pickers.description:
Mana Drain UW:
Effect: drains 1 MP/s for 100 sec
Target: Keep
Mana Cost: 0
Cooldown: 150 seconds

Mana Transfer UW:
Effect: restores 200 MP, gives 1000 gold
Target: Keep
Mana Cost: 225
Cooldown: 180 seconds

pickers.name: Mana Burn/Decoy [S]
pickers.description:
Mana Burn UW:
Effect: burns 200 mana
Target: Keep
Mana Cost: 75
Cooldown: 180 seconds

Decoy UW:
Damage: 0
Target: One building
Mana Cost: 30
Effect: None
Cooldown: 60 seconds

pickers.name: Mana Shield/Absorb [D]
pickers.description:
Mana Shield UW:
Effect: blocks 100 damage per point of mana
Target: Your Keep
Mana Cost: 5
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Absorb Mana UW:
Effect: drains 100 mana, then burns 100 mana
Target: Any Hero
Mana Cost: 0
Cooldown: 300 seconds

pickers.name: Repair/Shield [F]
pickers.description:
Emergency Repair UW:
Effect: heals 3000 HP over 20 sec
Target: One building (including enemies)
Mana Cost: 200
Cooldown: 300 seconds

Arcane Shield UW:
Effect: +500 armor for 120 sec
Target: One building (including enemies)
Mana Cost: 75
Cooldown: 240 seconds

pickers.name: Smite [Z]
pickers.description:

Target: ANY FUCKING unit
Mana Cost: 275

its all fun and games...
until Opaca smites his own raised Skeleton...

pickers.name: Sacrifice Ritual [X]
pickers.description:
Effect: N'Zoth is pleased
Target: Friendly non-Hero organic unit
Mana Cost: 200
Cooldown: 240 seconds

pickers.name: Spell Shield [C]
pickers.description:
Spell Shield UW:
Effect: blocks 4000 spell damage
Duration: 30 seconds
Target: All your buildings
Mana Cost: 125
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Hero Spell Shield UW:
Effect: blocks spell damage
Duration: 120 seconds
Target: Any unit
Mana Cost: 50
Cooldown: 300 seconds

A0OB.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
A0OB.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

A0OC.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

A0OD.name: Thunder Clap - [Level 4]
A0OD.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AHtc,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and slowing their movement by <AHtc,DataC4,%>% and attack rate by <AHtc,DataD4,%>%.
